comments.body:
> remove this once all the cloud provider change to GA topology labels

When will cloud provider change to GA topology labels, for in-tree driver, it's already in maintenance mode, so it would always use beta label? While for CSI driver, it won't use these labels.

We will move in-tree to GA label in this quarter as CSI migration is likely slip and the Beta label will probably be removed this or next release. I will make a PR about making gce-pd label to GA after this PR merged.
